snippet: Lindsey Vonn won the season-opening World Cup downhill Friday for her 16th victory at Lake Louise, Alberta, and her 34th career World Cup downhill victory.
abstract: Lindsey Vonn wins World Cup downhill at Lake Louise, Alberta; other skiing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn won the season-opening World Cup downhill Friday for her 16th victory at Lake Louise, Alberta, and her 34th career World Cup downhill victory.
